sen.j: 乙部 剛之進（おとべ ごうのしん、？－明治2年5月11日 (旧暦)(1869年6月20日)）は、幕末期の備中国備中松山藩士。
sen.e: Gonoshin Otobe (? - June 20, 1869) was a feudal retainer of the Matsuyama clan in Bicchu in Bicchu Province in the end of Edo period.
Gonoshin OTOBE (? - June 20, 1869) was a feudal retainer of the Matsuyama clan in Bicchu in Bicchu Province in the end of Edo period.
sen.cmt: Otobe を大文字に変更しました。
sen.e: Gonoshin OTOBE (? - June 20, 1869) was a feudal retainer of the Matsuyama clan in Bicchu in Bicchu Province in the end of Edo period.
Later, he joined Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).
Later, he joined Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).
sen.cmt: joined の前のスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: Later, he joined Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).
He is said to have used another name Ginjiro TAKEBE.
He is said to have used another name Ginjiro TAKEBE.
He is said to have used another name Ginjiro TAKEBE.

sen.j: 戊辰戦争で各地を転戦、仙台で榎本武揚艦隊と合流して、土方歳三配下の新選組に入隊。
sen.e: After fighting in various places, he joined Takeaki ENOMOTO fleet in Sendai, and joined Shinsengumi under control of Toshizo HIJIKATA.
After fighting in various places, he joined Takeaki ENOMOTO fleet in Sendai, and joined Shinsengumi under control of Toshizo HIJIKATA.
After fighting in various places, he joined Takeaki ENOMOTO fleet in Sendai, and joined Shinsengumi under control of Toshizo HIJIKATA.

sen.j: 箱館戦争箱館総攻撃により、弁天台場で戦死。
sen.e: He was killed at Benten Daiba in the all-out assault of Hakodate in the Hakodate War.
He was killed at Benten Daiba in the all-out assault of Hakodate in the Hakodate War.
sen.cmt: War の前のスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: He was killed at Benten Daiba in the all-out assault of Hakodate in the Hakodate War.
